resources.string:
This application will let you easily create a SiaCoin cold storage wallet, and safely store it on your Android device.

Due to the nature of a cold storage wallet, you will not be able to send transactions from this application.

It can be possible to do so by importing the seed generated in this tutorial.

We will now generate the seed for your wallet.

Write it down and keep it safe, you'll be able to retrieve your coins even if this application will stop working.

You'll not be able to take a screenshot of the seed, so make sure to have a piece of paper on hand.

Press the button when you're ready to go!
You\'ve completed the setup process, SiaCold is now ready to use!
